content: increase* x4 12 2 *single_crochet increase* x4 12 stuff the stem 3 *single_crochet increase* x6 18 sew onto the bottom of i made 3 small 2 medium and 1 large the bag that you already made weave a drawstring ribbon braid chain etc weave in ends into the chain spaces in round 17 of the bag jaina s crochet corner 2023 all rights reserved 4 congratulations you now have a beautiful new dice bag for your next dice games your circle of the spores druid or whatever else you can imagine thanks so much for following my pattern please feel free to follow me on instagram and ravelry and be a part of my crochet community @jainas crochet corner i look ravelry jainascrochet forward to keeping in touch ☺ all patterns designs and photographs included in this pattern are the property of jaina s crochet corner this pattern is for personal use only and the contents within may not be sold or shared with others any handmade items produced with this pattern may be sold freely jaina s crochet corner copyright 2023 jaina s crochet corner 2023 all rights reserved
